title: Cognee-Mcp-Server
description: An MCP server for Cognee, an AI memory engine, designed for knowledge graph construction and search functionalities.
creator: topoteretes

ENV.description: The environment in which the server is running (e.g., local).

TOKENIZERS_PARALLELISM.description: Flag to enable or disable parallelism for tokenizers.

LLM_API_KEY.description: The API key for the large language model (LLM).

GRAPH_DATABASE_PROVIDER.description: The provider for the graph database (e.g., networkx).

VECTOR_DB_PROVIDER.description: The provider for the vector database (e.g., lancedb).

DB_PROVIDER.description: The provider for the general database (e.g., sqlite).

DB_NAME.description: The name of the database used for storing knowledge graph data.
